tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Exercise,
review:
"This is appreciation note to Dr. Deepshikha Jha. "

As the lock down started, I had tough time to meet my previous doctor, who was taking care of me previously. I got to know that my previous doctor had just closed her hospital and she was away and not meeting any of her patients due to Covid 19, I, infact tried to reach many other doctors in RT Nagar , Bangalore, but everyone was scared to give appointment, all the doctors I spoke were giving online appointment. 

And in the mean time I came across Dr. Deepshikha Jha, she was the only one who gave me an appointment, she did meet me face to face and got me admitted as I was really not well. 

Dr. Deepshikha Jha is a very brave and a very responsible Doctor, though the Country was locked down and there was fear of Covid 19 everywhere, she never hesitated to meet me fave to face, She is very friendly and ready to help her patients. Even in the lock down I never had any problem for appointment and regular check ups. 

She is very positive in her nature and also shares lot of positivity with her patients. It helped me a lot to relieve the stress and stay relaxed all the time. 

In case of emergency Dr. Deepshikha Jha was just a call away. 

She is the only doctor I would strongly recommend. 

Thanks to Dr. Deepshikha Jha.
reply_text: This really means a lot .thank you  .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Me and my wife have been seeing Dr Deepshikha from past 8 months and the support and care received is amazing. Despite we reaching out to her multiple times on the call she has always responded on time and as she promised she got the delivery done without much pain to my wife. Though I was not allowed to OT but my wife said that Dr Deepshika was beside her holding her hand and getting the delivery successful. Just want to thank Dr Deepshikha for the support and care in getting this phase completed without much complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was 32 years and pre diabetic. My pregnancy was not a smooth one, I had conceived just before pandemic started. Me and my husband were all one in Bangalore. My mother could not travel from Kolkata due to lockdown. As this was my 1st pregnancy and no senior family members were around, I was totally and blindly dependent on Dr. Dipshikha. She was just a whatsapp message or phone call away. Not only she did my regular check up, but she had council me for every ups and downs. We are grateful for her immense support throughout the pregnancy and even post delivery as well. I highly recommend Dr. Dipshikha, *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy care and management,
review: We consulted Dr. Deepshika right from the start, for Pre/Post Delivery and Delivery.... from the 1st trimesters of pregnancy....We really liked her approach, especially, her recommendations, guidance and the way she empathises, understands the concern of the patient, and keeps everyone relaxed, comfortable, positive and motivated...We were in regular communication and consultation with her over the 3 trimesters and she guided us at every step, even during the recent pandemic. My wife went through a normal delivery and we are very grateful and happy for Dr. Deepshika's overall care, support, guidance throughout this journey..We definitely recommend her to All.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,
review: I'm delighted to share our positive experience with Dr. Deepshika, our exceptional gynaecologist. Throughout my wife's pregnancy journey, Dr. Deepshika demonstrated unwavering expertise, compassion, and support. Her personalized care, clear communication, and attentiveness made this experience truly special. We are grateful for her guidance and highly recommend her to others on their pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review: We have consulted Dr Deepshikha after my wife was conceived. The support and care received is amazing. Despite her busyness, she has always responded on time. She is extremely friendly in explaining queries during checkups and always been good support to my wife. I definitely recommend Dr Deepshikha as we are extremely satisfied.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Deepshikha Jha provides great advice regarding pregnancy related issues which occurs to most of the ladies. I will look forward for her advice post my delivery also. This time while taking my latest advice,  i am 39 weeks pregnant and suffering from cold. She helped me with right consultation.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Deepshika Jha for others.

We had a great experience with Dr. Deepshikha. Being a 1st baby experience we were a bit nervous, anxious but the way she listened to us, explained each & every point. Explaining pros & cons of everything and what could be the best considering all constraints. 
Thank you Dr. Deepshikha.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dear Dr. Deepshika 
I first want to thank you for your care and concern. Initially During labour I was very nervous but your empathetic words put me at ease and helped me gain confidence. You made me comfortable to approach you anytime either directly or on calls and gave me solutions. Thanks for being so dedicated. Your kindness, sincere care and concern made everything better and have normal delivery. Because of you my baby and me are doing very well.  Thank you once again for your time and consideration.
With gratitude
Roja.J
